comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Spelling used in NYTimes is : Mustapha Pasha Several accounts of the war were filed with this dateline. This was the name of several Ottoman leaders. According to Wikipedia after 1912 the town was renamed Svilengrad: and it is part of Bulgaria here is citation for that tidbit: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mustafa_Pasha Here is bit about Svilengrad: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Svilengrad

comment._content: Thanks, Harry!  We will add a note to our source data and reload the description.
